cs.GT, cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses opinion formation games, which are a topic of interest in game theory (cs.GT), social networks (cs.SOC), and information theory (cs.IT). The paper also mentions mathematical sociology, which falls under the social networks category. The use of directed graphs and the analysis of the price of anarchy suggest that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of computational complexity (cs.DS) and computational social science (cs.SI).
